AiiDA
  • Docs »
  • StructureData
  • View page source

Here you will find all sorts of tutorials that show how to work with AiiDA and the various plug-ins that are available for it The AiiDA plugins for Quantum ESPRESSO provide a set of tutorials for some of the main Quantum ESPRESSO codes (PW, PH, CP, and one of the post-processing tools PROJWFC). You can find them on the plugin documentation page.
